attributes.action: Make Murder mandatory charge when a child has been beaten to death.
attributes.additional_details:
These people are literally getting away with murder.
To often we see the most horrific crimes reduced to manslaughter.
attributes.background: Change the law to make Murder mandatory where a child has been attacked and killed by a parent or guardian. To many times we see people out in four years for the most horrific abuse and torture of babies and children.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about what offences to charge someone for are a matter for the Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory life sentence for abuse of a child: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580645
